Reviews.Title: “DONTS STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: Josh H
Reviews.Content: This place is nasty! Ants, Roche's, The manager BRYAN at the forest lane location is the most ungrateful and RUDE person anyone could ever meet! And i over heard him talking about how "big" a Guest was let me tell you he has no room to talk. You ask for things to be fixed it takes 2 days but they so "oh we came by" no you did not i was here all day! Then there was mold growing under the window in the main room I told them about it and what did they do PAINTED OVER IT! That's it! That dot kill the mold Dumb! The girl who is new at the front desk is rude as hell her name something lie Araianna! They need new management! They might get it by the time I am through with them! They are always cops in and out of here because of he drugs but the management don't do anything about it. It has to be a guest call the cps!

Reviews.Title: “budget suites fossil creek”
Reviews.Author: thomashamilton
Reviews.Content: not child friendly, dog crap everywhere would not recomend to stay here at all laundry takes ur money. unkept grounds vicious dog breeds r present no amminities to speak of always locked they take ur belongings if ur one day late with rent glorified thieves. children r not allowed out side at all no recreation area managers drink at the pool and date guests overall a totally unprofessional and immoral place to live dont waist ur money

Reviews.Title: “It's cool”
Reviews.Author: dino j
Reviews.Content: I'm on business, and I travel from city to city. This hotel is a good place to stay, no insect problems, clean, very appartment like. I would send freinds here to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible place to stay, manager BRYAN at Forest location was very rude and unproffesional”
Reviews.Author: celiaRichardson
Reviews.Content: Stayed at hotel while my grandfather was in the hospital and later died. The manager BRYAN didn't respond to calls to the ofc. reguarding ants in our room and getting the room cleaned. It was a hard enough week for us dealing with the loss of my Grandpa, I shouldnt have to deal with a manager who ignores our calls, puts us in a dirty room and hangs up on us during a phone conversation. Save your hard earned money and go somewhere that the management cares about their customers. Very rude and will never stay there again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Management”
Reviews.Author: CloudStatic
Reviews.Content: Zane Silverthorn is probably one of the worst managers you'll ever meet. I stayed here due to unforeseen circumstances and financial issues, and if you're so much as half an hour late on the rent, he shows up to boot you, no warning, not even if you're dressed in proper attire or even have your purse on you (and how does he expect you to pay if he wants to lock you out without having a way to get the money?). With the suspicious people, drug dealers, cops outside every weekend, and shoddy security, it's a hellhole. Probably the worst place I've lived in yet! If you HAVE to stay and need to talk to someone, ask for William, he knows how to treat people like humans.

Reviews.Title: “Scary, Dangerous & nasty, nasty, nasty-Ghetto!”
Reviews.Author: rippedoffTexas
Reviews.Content: At night you have thugs in the courtyard LOUD, yelling & arguing very threatening and intimidating. The security guard will walk thru and acts like he is afraid of them! I am afraid to go get something out of my car at night. You sign a form agreeing to a 9pm curfew but these gangster types, thugs and prostitutes hang out on the grounds and are very loud and obnoxious. This is the scariest hotel I have ever stayed in and I have traveled a bit for work I am not on the first floor and can hear the yelling over my television-its THAT bad. I can't imagine staying here with children. This place tells you the office is open 24 hours a day and they have good security-NOT. Tried calling the office tonight-no answer, walked down there and it is closed. The thugs have the place until daylight. I am going to offer the courtesy of a warning to fellow travelers- I wish someone had warned me!!! Leaving to tomorrow and no they do not refund-no security no refund. I will walk away from the money my safety is worth more than that.

Reviews.Title: “ROOM SERVICE LADIES!”
Reviews.Author: cubefan1
Reviews.Content: I would never recommend this hotel to any married women! the room service maid by the name of "Jessica P." slept with my husband who was staying in this hotel. this is not what i ment by "Great Room Service!!! Thanks!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Scary, Unmentionables!”
Reviews.Author: Nellstersru
Reviews.Content: As a necessity I needed to be close to the hospitals in Dallas. I needed 3 surgeries. After the last surgery the manager called and told me the monthly rent was due the day before. I went in to pay and she told me that she had left a courtesy message on my phone the day before. Phone hardly works and shows no message waiting light. Her response was that "She was sorry, but I would have to pay a $15.00 late fee! This was 7:00am the very next morning no less. I had been staying there since April 08 and this was Sept. 08. Poor customer service. After I am well enough to leave I will never use their facilities again anywhere --no way! no how! Besides being a high crime area, the MANAGEMENT does not seem to care about keeping the good residents. Any complaints about anything will fall on deaf ears here. I do not recommend this facility for anyone. Empire Central and Stemmons Frwy, Dallas, TX

Reviews.Title: “Scary stay”
Reviews.Author: Textocal
Reviews.Content: The room smelled of dog urine and the carpet was greasy feeling. We had to stay during a move for several weeks. The other guests were very undesirable and scary. It was like a ghetto. There were people using bbq grills under the stairs and against the walls and management did not take any actions on it. Lots of loud kids and adults. There seemed to be no control of the guests.

Reviews.Title: “unfriendly uncooperative on-duty-manager”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: you will be in questionable company once you check into the budget suites of dallas, tx at market center - be prepared for a ghetto-like atmosphere including junk-cars, drug-dealers and prostitutes. in the room they will not give you a blanket because they think you won't give it back - instead they ask you to use the bed-cover as substitute. that will be made of plastic and has never been cleaned. the on-duty manager will treat you like judge judy, not even close to accomodating any request at all. and they think they can do it because charges are non-refundable. the way around this is to check out early and dispute the charge with your credit-card-company. first and last time for me at this chain.

HotelInfo.Name: Budget Suites of America-Dallas
HotelInfo.Address: 9519 Forest Lane, Dallas, TX 75243-5901
